activities: NFS will process orders for a continuity program offering music to customers in the UK.  NFS will take phone orders and will process credit cards and the shipping of the orders will take place from a UK warehouse.  Volume will be fairly small - potentially 5,000 shipments per year.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: NFS has contracted the DMA  (The Direct Marketing Association) as the Third party dispute resolution mechanism.  If you need additional information on the contract with the DMA they can be contacted directly or contact me for further information.
